entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 8 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
